alert.note: Alert for Brown; Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:28PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brown and northeastern Outagamie Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pulaski, or 12 miles west of Green Bay, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hobart around 640 PM CDT. Green Bay around 645 PM CDT. Bellevue around 700 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Little Rapids, Anston, Rose Lawn, Kunesh, Bellevue, Glenmore, Pittsfield, Oneida, De Pere and Lambeau Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
